pages.text: > $(n)Health:$() ?  $(br)> $(n)Attack Damage:$() ? $(br)> $(n)Behavior:$() Very hostile     $(br)> $(n)Spawn:$() Unknown    $(br)> $(n)Properties:$() $(br)The $(thing)Wither Storm$() is a more destructive version of the $(l:creatures/boss-wither)Wither$(). $(br)It sucks blocks and mobs to make it bigger and stronger. $(br)It eventually becomes a giant monster with 5 tentacles and three heads that can fire a tractor beam!
Legends say, that this structure creates a $(thing)Wither Storm$().
